definition: to turn over/to flip over/to overturn/to rummage through/to translate/to decode/to double/to climb over or into/to cross

to open/to start/to turn on/to boil/to write out (a prescription, check, invoice etc)/to operate (a vehicle)/carat (gold)/abbr. for Kelvin, 開爾文|开尔文[Kai1 er3 wen2]/abbr. for 開本|开本[kai1 ben3], book format

sentences.english: OK. Now open your books at page 2.
sentences.chinese: 现在请同学们翻开书第二页。

sentences.english: Read words of inspiration. Find your favorite book that inspires you and open it to a random page.
sentences.chinese: 找到你最喜欢的励志书，翻开任意一页。

sentences.english: I with stone, the Hao arrived at that"house" and open a door to go in.
sentences.chinese: 我用石材啊郝离开《屋》啊翻开门出来。

sentences.english: Open Son of Hibachi making sure the handles are in proper position and locked.
sentences.chinese: 翻开烤烤炉，确认手把位置以及能否固定了。

sentences.english: A new chapter for Libya, but will the victors stay united?
sentences.chinese: 利比亚翻开了新篇章，但胜利者仍会团结一致吗？

sentences.english: Aurora Greenway: Then go home and turn them on.
sentences.chinese: 那么就回家去然后把灯都翻开。

sentences.english: At that moment, farming opened her office door, let pull in Tampa.
sentences.chinese: 正在此时，农翻开办公室的门，让拉坦进去。

sentences.english: Button, you can turn over tiles to see its image.
sentences.chinese: 按钮，你可以翻开花砖地看到它的形象。

sentences.english: With one penny Ihad this peculiar pen opened.
sentences.chinese: 我花了一便士让人把这支奇特的钢笔翻开了。

sentences.english: He opened the book and found a phrase.
sentences.chinese: 他翻开书找了一条短语。

sentences.english: Heclimbs up, and I open the book.
Please turn your Bibles to Nehemiah, Chapter 9.
sentences.chinese: 请翻开圣经尼希米记第9章。

sentences.english: Being lucky can turn over to open this volume, in usually persons eye all definitely not of no importance.
sentences.chinese: 有幸能翻开本册者，在寻常人眼里都决非等闲之辈。

sentences.english: In the spring, we plunge shovels into the garden plot, turn under the dark compost.
sentences.chinese: 春天，我们用铁锨翻开园子里黑油油的沃土。

sentences.english: We hope that through your visit the China Canada relationship will turn a new page.
sentences.chinese: 希望通过你的访问，中加关系能够翻开新的一页。

sentences.english: She opened the book at random and started reading.
sentences.chinese: 她随意翻开书就看了起来。

definition: to thumb through/to flip through (a book)
to turn over/to flip over/to overturn/to rummage through/to translate/to decode/to double/to climb over or into/to cross
to take down (in writing)/notes/a type of literature consisting mainly of short sketches/CL:本[ben3]
book/notebook/Japanese-style self-published comic (esp. an erotic one), aka "dōjinshi"/CL:本[ben3]/edition
